thread.title: Power outages reported after crash on Liberty Road in Lexington
thread.title_full: Power outages reported after crash on Liberty Road in Lexington

author: Web Staff
title: Power outages reported after crash on Liberty Road in Lexington
text:
UPDATE: Jan. 2 at 4:19 p.m.
Outbound Liberty Road has now been shut down at New Circle Road until further notice due to damage to the electric pole from the crash, according to Lexwrecks.
Original:
According to Lexwrecks, an injury collision on Liberty Road at Wilderness Road shut down the outbound lane after a vehicle struck an electric pole. Power outages are reported in the area.
Injury Collision:
â€” lexwrecks (@lexwrecks)
Outbound Liberty Rd at Wilderness Rd -
A single vehicle struck an electric pole. The outbound lane is shut down.[pic.twitter.com/u16FvfMB9q][January 2, 2025]
The [LG&E and KU outage map](https://stormcenter.lge-ku.com/) shows there are 1,354 total estimated customers without power in the area. The map says that one area outages have an estimated time of restoration for Thursday at 6:30 p.m.
